message: Bloody hell. Off to read the manga and buy a dozen of mahjong books. Thank you, Fukumoto Nobuyuki, for possibly making a mahjong addict out of me.

Its been a literal few minutes and I'm back. Turns out Akagi continues battling him for all the rest of near about 160+ chapters. (What the actual fuck?) This is one of the instances where I'll say holy shit that is way to fucking long of an arc and for it to be the ending as well. I understand why the Anime ended here. Nobody wanna see 60+ more episodes of Akagi vs the old guy whatever his name is. Warning note to y'all, the show essentially ends here, unless you're tryna read the manga with a fucj ton of chapters continuously Akagi vs the old guy where he outsmarts Akagi, then Akagi goes jokes on you I'm still alive because of [bullshit here]. Anime was very enjoyable, with Akagi being one of a kind protagonist. Sad how the show plays out though. 6/10 from me.

damn lol thats way too long wtf hows he still alive..thanks for the warning
love finding these hidden gems
ayo man nice that I am not the only one watching this but imo its a solid 8/10
Oi oi oi, now what that person on the first episode of Akagi said makes sense. They really ended it here? I can't stop here, boutta binge the manga if there hopefully is a continuation after this.
